body:
The GetName method is only defined for pointer receiver
on TTeacher, but ei contains t, which is a TTeacher, and
its method set won't contain any methods that are defined
for pointer receiver.

Please see https://golang.org/doc/faq#different_method_sets
for details.

And note that we only use the issue tracker for bug reports,
not for general questions like this, please see
https://golang.org/wiki/Questions for places to raise questions.
